TextView.android:text: S-6 is acts on genitor urinary system. First it act on kidney and then urinary bladder, urethra, Genito-urinary system. It is great medicine for kidney and its surroundings. By dissolving and excreting out all type of hard foreign matter and dirt. It has valuable tonic properties. Used in bath in case of general weakness and cachexia. It has proved beneficial in case of bleeding from wounds, when Angiotico has failed.

•Lymphatic or metabolic and digestive remedy.
 •S6 is a remedy for urinary system. 
 Specific for kidneys as well as ureters, bladder and urethra. 
 •S6 and S2 both are specific urinary system, S2 for urinary bladder and other parts of urinary system, but S6 for kidneys and other parts of urinary systems. 
 •Chief remedy for renal colic, renal calculi. Increase renal filtration, washes kidneys. 
 •Removes amorphous substances from our body and cure so many diseases. 
 •Gout and deposition of uric acid, restricted movements of joints, with other remedy.
 •Lower dill increases renal filtration; higher dill decreases renal filtration. 
 •In polyuria higher, in oliguria lower dill, in edema or dropsy lower dill.
 •Mucosal surface of GIT, disease of heart with Angiotico group
 •Control the blood pressure, reduces the retention of sodium, cure edema and dropsy, inflammation of body S6 + A1

1] NASTURTIUM OFFICINALIS-25-Parts-Water cress-\n Used for UTI, swollen airways, Cough and Bronchitis, Diuretic, Expectorant, Prevent Scurvy, cleans the blood and skin. Water cress is very rich in VITAMINS and MINERALS. It’s high content of VITAMIN C makes it is a remedy i.e. particularly valuable for chronic illness.

2] SCROFULARIA NODOSA-20-Parts-Figwort-\n A powerful medicine whenever enlarge glands are present. HODGKINS DISEASE [A cancer of lymphatic system, which is part of our immune system]. A valuable skin remedy. Has a specific affinity for the breast, very useful in breast tumors. Eczema of ears Pruritis vagina. Lupoid ulceration of pharynx. Scrofulous swelling, painful hemorrhoids, Tubercular testis, Epithelioma, small lymph nodes enlarge in the breasts, Pain in all flexor muscles. Blood cleansing tonic, Diuretic, Poultice apply for Gangrene, swollen lymph glands Psoriasis, Boils, Small wounds.
3] SMILAX MEDICA-20-Parts-Sarsaparilla-\n Rheumatism, Arthritis, Renal calculi, Nephritis, Influenza, Lack off appetite, Poor digestion, Acne and Eczema. Psoriasis and skin diseases, kidney diseases.

4] NASTURTIUM OFFICINALIS-10-Parts-Water cress- Used for UTI , swollen airways, Cough and Bronchitis, Diuretic, Expectorant ,Prevent Scurvy ,cleans the blood and skin. Water cress is very rich in VITAMINS and MINERALS. It’s high content of VITAMIN C makes it is a remedy i.e., particularly valuable for chronic illness.

4] SOLIDAGO VIRGAURA-20-Parts-\n Repeated colds of tuberculosis, feeling of weakness nasopharyngeal catarrh, burning in throat. operation, pain in region of kidneys with dysuria, kidneys sensitive to pressure, Bright’s disease fever.

6] VERONICA OFFICINALIS-10-Parts-Speed well-\n Used as a tonic, to cause sweating, to purify blood and to increase metabolism, Invigorating, Appetizer and Digestive, Expectorant, Diuretic, Depurative, Pharyngitis, Bronchitis, Catarrh, Cough.

7] MATRICARIA CHAMOMILLA-10-Parts-Chamomile-\n Soothe Nervous stress, Digestive problems, Ulcerated or inflamed bowel. Excess intake, weak stomach muscles. It is also used as a mild laxative and is anti-inflammatory, Bactericidal.

8] MATRICARIA CHAMOMILLA-10-Parts-Chamomile-\n Soothe Nervous stress, Digestive problems, Ulcerated or inflamed bowel. Excess intake, weak stomach muscles. It is also used as a mild laxative and is anti-inflammatory, Bactericidal.

8]COCHLARIA OFFICINALIS-5-Parts-Water Cress/Scurvy Grass-\n Antiscorbutic, Appetizer and digestive, Diuretic and Depurative, Rubefacient i.e .attract the blood towards the skin, thus reducing the congestion of internal organs, blood purifier ,skin irritation.

9] TUSSILAGO FARFARA-5-Parts-Colts foot-\n For Bronchitis, Asthma, Whopping cough, Lung cancer, Emphysema, Inflammation, Rheumatism, Swelling Water retention and Tuberculosis. Leaves reach in VITAMIN C and ZINK.
